306320.「……文献には 神化するには この炎で\n 魂を焼かねばならないと 書いてありま:
Based on what I read, in order to become a
god, one's soul must be burned in this fire.

306321.「肉体ではなく 魂を焼くという炎……。\n この炎に飛び込めば……。:
A flame that burns the soul, but not the
body... If one were to jump inside this
flame, then...

306322.「あとは ここで あなたか フォステイルが \n 神になれば 秘伝の間の 開かず:
All that's left is for you or Fostail to
become a god with this, and then we can
open the door to that secret room...

306323.「あとは ここで フォステイルが \n 神になれば 秘伝の間の 開かずの扉を\n:
All that's left is for Fostail to become a
god with this, and then we can open the
door to that secret room...

306324.「おお！ 神化の光炉じゃないか！\n こんな物まで 用意されていたとは……\n:
Oh! There's a Furnace of Deification here,
too?! To think they prepared another one down
here...our ancestors are really something!

306325.「反対側の扉にも 入ってみたんだが\n そっちには 大地の箱舟に よく似た\n:
I went through the door across the hall and
found a vehicle that looks just like the Ark
of the Earth! I was utterly amazed!

306326.「フフン。どうやら 最高のタイミングで\n 登場した……って感じかな？:
Hmm hmm... I suppose I showed up at just the
right time, huh?

306327.「ルーベの監視の 増員も手配できたんで\n 様子を 見にきたんだよ！\n そした:
I arranged for more security regarding Rubay,
so I came to check on you! That's when I ran
into Foss here.

306328.「私の助けが 必要になるのではないか……。\n そんな予感が したのさ。\n 実:
I had a feeling that you'd need my help...
So I was right, then?

306329.<pc>は 自分か フォステイルの\nどちらかが 神化しなければ\n何も進展しな:
<pc>told Fostail that in order to
move things forward, one of them would
have to undergo deification.

306330.「そういうことなら\n 私が 神化を引き受けよう。\n 君は そのままの プクリ:
If that's the case, then let me handle it.
You can stay as the Pukulipo you already
are.

306331.<pc>は フォステイルに\n神化してもらわなければ\n何も進展しないと 告げた:
<pc> told Fostail that he would
need to undergo deification for things
to move forward.

306332.「そういうことなら\n 神化を 引き受けよう。:
If that's the case, then I'll go ahead with
deification.

306333.「今度こそ 安全に\n 神化できると考えて よいのだろうね？\n 悪神になるのは:
I can safely assume that deification will go
as planned this time, yes? I'd rather not be
turned into a fiend.

306334.「痛いところを つかないでおくれよ。\n 今度という 今度は 万全の態勢を\n:
Don't kick me while I'm down! I'm fully,
FULLY prepared this time. I swear on
Lutiana.

306335.「とりあえず この炉を調べるところから\n 始めないとな……。また 招集をかける:
For now, I'll start by taking a closer look at this furnace. I'll call another meeting once I'm finished, so feel free to relax in the
rest spot or do as you please until then.

306336.<pc>たちは 回生堂に向かった……。:
<pc> and co. made their way to the
rest spot...

306337.「おっ 来た来た！ フォステイルの神化が\n もうじき 終わるってよ。:
Oh, there you are! Fostail's deification is
just about done.

306338.「プクリポから 神が誕生すれば\n めでたく 六種族の神が そろいますね。:
If a god is born from a Pukulipo, then that
means we will have six gods from each of
the races.

306339.「神が そろうと……どうなるんだっけ？:
So...what happens when all the gods come
together?

306340.「……兄ちゃん 忘れちゃったの？\n 六種族の神が ここに つどうと\n あの扉:
...did you forget already? When the gods of
the six races gather here, that door will
open.

306341.「アストルティアの楯の 真のチカラを\n 解放する手段が 扉の向こうにあるんだ。:
The means of unlocking the Shield of
Astoltia's true power lies beyond it.

306342.「石碑に 書いてあったろ。\n ちゃんと 読まなかったのかい？:
It was written on the monument. Didn't you
read it?

306343.「復習の意味で 聞いたんだ。\n <pc>が 忘れてるかも しんないだろ。:
I...I'm just asking for a refresher, that's
all. Besides, <pc> might've
forgotten too!

306346.「よろこばしきかな！ また 新たに\n 一柱の神が 顕現するに至った。:
Rejoice! Once again, a new deity has revealed
itself.

306348.「大げさなのは やめてほしいのだが……。: There's no need for any of that...

306352.「さあ <pc>さま。\n あなたは わたくしたちの中心に。:
Go on, <pc>.
You are our center.

306355.「声の主に 呼ばれているのは\n <pc>さまだけの ようですが\n おひとりで:
It seems like only <pc> is being
called by that voice, but is it really okay
to let them go all alone...?

306356.「ひとりきりで 奥まで来いとは\n 言ってなかったろ。私も 同行するとしよう。:
It didn't say that they had to go alone.
I'll go along with them.

306358.「全員で付いていったら ジア・クトが\n 襲ってきたときに 対処のしようがないね:
If we all go, then we won't have much of a
chance whenever Dia Kut decides to strike.

306359.「ならば 私たちは 残って\n 天星郷の守りを 固めるとしましょう。:
Then we can stay back and protect the
Firmament.

306360.「誰も いませんね。\n 声の主すら いないとは……。:
No one's here. Not even whoever that voice
belongs to...

306361.「神具の所有者よ。\n よくぞ 神授の間に たどり着いた。:
Bearer of the divine artifacts.
You have done well to reach this Hall of
Divine Gifts.

306362.「我は 女神ルティアナ。\n のちの世では アストルティアを\n 創りし者として:
I am the Goddess Lutiana. In the future,
I shall be remembered at Astoltia's creator.

306363.「こ この方が 生のルティアナ様！\n お会いしとうございました！:
T...this is the real Lady Lutiana!
It's such an honor to meet you!

306364.「天使長 ルティアナ様は\n ジャゴヌバとの戦いで……。:
Archangel, Lutiana was locked in battle
against Jagonuba, and...

306365.「あっ ああ。私としたことが……。: R...right. I got a bit carried away...

306366.「このルティアナ様は 神話の時代にでも\n 記録された お姿なのかな……。:
I wonder if this Lutiana is just something
recorded from the Mythical Age...

306367.「神剣と楯を 所有する者よ。\n 汝が 何ゆえ チカラを求めるのか\n じかに:
Bearer of the divine sword and shield.
I cannot directly question why you seek
power.

306368.「汝が 世界を守らんとする者か\n 私欲のため 強大なチカラを得ようと\n して:
Do you wish to use it to protect the world?
...or do you seek power for your own selfish
desires?

306369.「ひとたび 神具のチカラを 解放すれば\n 汝は 我に匹敵しうる存在……\n 創:
Once the power of the divine artifacts is unlocked, you will be able to become a being that rivals even me...a Colossus
of Creation.

306370.「みだりに与えるのは はばかられる\n 絶大なる チカラであるゆえ これまでの試:
To give such an immense power away so easily
would be unwise. That is why I had my proxies
verify your wisdom and your heart.

306371.「最後に この荒ぶるチカラを \n あつかえるだけの 力量があるかを試す。\n:
At last, I shall test you to see if you are
strong enough to control this unruly power.
Show your power to my faithful servants.

306372.「戦えるのは 神具の所有者のみ。\n 天使や 神々の助力は そのいっさいを禁ず。:
Only the one who bears the divine artifacts
may fight. Assistance from angels or gods
is forbidden.

306373.「ここまで 付いてきて\n 見ているだけだなんて……無念です。:
How frustrating to come all this way and
only be allowed to watch...

306374.「信じるよ！ お前なら かならずや\n ルティアナ様のお眼鏡に かなうだろうさ！:
I believe in you! I know you'll gain
Lutiana's favor for sure!

306375.「我 汝の力量を認める。\n 神具の 秘めたるチカラを 解放しよう。:
I acknowledge your strength. I shall now
unlock the hidden power sleeping within
the divine artifacts.

306376.「神剣レクタリスと アストルティアの楯。\n その絶大なるチカラの源泉は 協力者:
Lectalis, the divine sword...the Shield of Astoltia... The source of their immense power lies in nourishing the power of cooperating
gods...

306377.「神剣は 星さえも 両断し\n 楯は 神々と融合し 創生巨神に\n 変化するチカ:
The sword can cleave even the stars, while the shield holds the power to merge as one with the gods, transforming you into a
Colossus of Creation.

306378.「神具の所有者よ。\n アストルティアの楯を手に\n 我が前に 立つがよい。:
Bearer of the divine artifacts.
Stand before me with the Shield of
Astoltia in your hand.

306379.アストルティアの楯に 秘められた\n真のチカラが 解放された！:
The true power hidden within the Shield of
Astoltia has been unlocked!

306380.「これより 汝は 念じるだけで\n 神々と融合し 霊子のよろいをまといて\n 創:
You may now fuse with the gods with just a
mere thought, clad in armor of the spirit
specks, and become a Colossus of Creation.

306381.「ひとたび 創生巨神となれば 海を裂き\n 山を砕き 大地を割ることすら たやす:
Once a Colossus of Creation, you can easily
part the seas, shatter mountains, and even
split the earth you walk on.

306382.「ただし そのチカラは 無限にあらず。\n 創生巨神の顕現には 融合した 神々の:
However, this power is not infinite. For a
Colossus to remain manifested, the very
lifeblood of the merged gods is required.

306383.「神々の命が 尽き果てる前に 変化は解け\n 回復するまでの間 再び\n 創生巨:
The transformation will fade before their life
energy is exhausted, and you may not transform
again while they are recovering.

306384.「このチカラは いまわしき侵略者……\n ジア・クト念晶体に 対抗するための\n:
This power was prepared as a means to drive
back those abhorrent invaders, the Dia Kut
Telecrystal.

306385.「神化の光炉や 天の箱舟も みな……\n ジア・クトの脅威に そなえるための物。:
The Furnace of Deification, and the Starflight
Express...these were both designed with the
purpose of preparing for Dia Kut's threat.

306386.「もし今 汝が ジア・クトの脅威に\n 直面しているならば 神々や 天使と\n:
If you now face this threat, I hope that you
will join hands with both gods and angels
to overcome these hardships.

306387.「すべては 最悪の事態を想定しての\n そなえだったのですね。:
This was all in preparation for the absolute
worst-case scenario, wasn't it...

306388.「ルティアナ様も 本心では\n この神殿が 閉ざされたままであって\n ほしかっ:
I think Lutiana may have really wanted this
temple to remain closed for good...

306389.「やっぱ 無事だったか。\n さすがだぜ <cs_pchero>！:
I knew you were fine! Never once doubted
you, <cs_pchero>!

306390.「帰りが遅いから 様子を見にきたんだけど\n 余計な お世話だったかな。:
We came to check on you since you guys were
running a bit late. Hope I wasn't intruding on
anything.

306392.「期待以上の 成果さ。\n ルティアナ様が 我らを想って\n これだけの準備を…:
It went better than I could've possibly
imagined. Lutiana prepared all this for us,
putting our well-being first... *sob, sob*

306393.<cs_pchero>は ふたりに\n女神ルティアナが 遺してくれた\n記録の内:
<cs_pchero> relayed the exact
information left by Lutiana's recording.

306394.「そりゃ すげえな……。\n うまく使えば ジア・クトどもを\n 一掃できるんじ:
That's incredible... If we use it correctly,
we'll wipe those Dia Kut guys out for
good, yeah?

306395.「うまく使えば……か。\n ならば できるだけ 敵の情報をつかんで\n 一撃必殺:
If we use it effectively, hmm... In that case, we should gather as much information as we can about our enemy, and aim for a one
shot kill.

306396.「もう一度 ジア・ルーベと\n 向き合わなければ ならないようだね。\n そろそ:
I guess I'm gonna have to face Dia Rubay
again. I hope she's at least calmed down by
now...

306397.「よし！ 回生堂の２階にある\n ジア・ルーベの部屋に 行ってみるか。:
All right! Dia Rubay is staying in the second
floor room in the rest spot. Shall we?

306398.「よお！ アタマは 冷えたかい？: Hey there! Have you had a chance to cool off?

306399.「王の愛などと おだてられ……\n 有頂天になっていた。ルーベたちは 幼さに\n:
We were flattered by our ruler's love,
becoming overconfident... Our youth taken
advantage of... By him...by Genos.

306401.「今なら おたがい 腹を割って\n 話が できるんじゃあないのかい？:
Now is a good time for us to have a heart-to-
heart, don't you agree?

306402.「我々は お前たちのことを\n あまりにも 知らなすぎる。\n 侵略の目的とか:
We hardly know anything about you.
The purpose of your invasion, your joys in
life...and so on.

306403.「ジア・クト念晶体は 次元のカベを越えて\n 旅する種族。創生のチカラを 収穫す:
The Dia Kut Telecrystal is a species that
travels between dimensional boundaries.
To harvest the power of creation.

306404.「ルーベたち 念晶体は 完全硬化し\n 消滅すると言われている……定期的に\n:
We telecrystals are said to fully harden and
die off...if we do not consistently draw upon
the power of creation.

306405.「ただそこに あるだけで 創生のチカラは\n 万物に宿り 生み出されていくもの。:
The power of creation simply exists, residing
in all things and birthing new ones. What
could possibly prevent that...?

306406.「ジア・クトの 宿命かもしれない。\n ルーベたちは ほかから 奪うしかないの\:
Perhaps that is the fate of Dia Kut. We have
no choice back to take it from others. We
cannot produce the power of creation.

306407.「生きるための 侵略と 収穫か。\n はた迷惑な存在だねぇ……。:
Invading and harvesting for the purpose of
survival, huh? Quite the nuisance, they are...

306408.「ゲノスは 待っている 刻が満ちるのを。\n 大収穫によって この世界の 創生の:
Genos is waiting for the opportune moment. With a great harvest, the power of creation existing in this world will be reaped clean
by Dia Kut.

306409.「ついに 全軍で しかけてくるのですか！:
Are they finally planning on attacking us with
their entire army!?

306410.「あっは！ そんな 非効率なことはしない。\n 念晶巨人を投下して いっきにやる:
Heh! We do not do such inefficient things. We
will release the Telecrystal Titan and do it
immediately.

306412.「このフォーリオンなどより ずっと巨大な\n ジア・クトの超兵器。手も足も出せな:
Much bigger than Fourion Dia Kut's superweapon
is. It's untouchable.

306413.「何が おかしいの。\n 錯乱してるの？ 恐怖のあまり。:
What's so funny? Are you delirious?
Out of sheer terror?

306414.「いやね つい先ほど 我々は\n 巨大化の手段を 手に入れたんだよ。\n かぶっ:
For your information, we recently just
discovered a means to create a titan of our
own. Seems like we both had the same idea.

306415.「しかし 巨人同士で ぶつかりあうんじゃ\n 地上に どれだけの被害が出るか\n:
But if those giants collide with one another,
there's no telling how much damage they'll
cause on the surface...

306416.「やはり ジア・クトの本拠地\n 魔眼の月を直接 ぶったたいたほうが\n この戦:
Striking down Dia Kut's stronghold, the
Eye of Evil, would be the quickest way to end
this battle, anyways.

306417.「やってみればいい やれるものなら。\n ゲノスが 散るさま……\n かなうなら:
Just try it, if you think you can. With my own
eyes...I'd like to see Genos fall.

306418.「魔眼の月を 攻めるつもりなら\n これを あげる。未知の情報を知れるはず。\n:
If you plan to attack the Eye of Evil, then I
give this to you. You will learn of unknown
information. About our impenetrable fortress.

306420.「それは 念晶環。思念を介して\n 格納された情報を 読み取る装置。\n あんた:
It is a telecrystal ring. A device that reads
stored information via thought. Even you
should be able to handle it.

306421.「おお！ そいつは 大層なモンだねえ。\n ありがたく 活用させてもらうよ！:
Oh! This is pretty important, then!
Thanks, we'll make good use of it!

306422.「さっそく 聖天舎に戻って こいつから\n 情報を引き出し 魔眼の月 せん滅作戦:
Let's go back to the monastery and see what
information we can get from this. We can work
out the details of destroying the Eye of Evil.

306423.「久しいな ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。\n 再び まみえる機会を得られて\n 余も:
It's been some time, Descendants of the
Cradle. I am delighted we have the
opportunity to meet once more.

306425.「貴様たちの歴史が 今\n 終わりの時を 迎えようとしている。: Your history is soon coming to an end.

306426.「アストルティア文明 とでも言うべき\n 石くれのような 無価値な歴史がな。:
Astoltia's civilization...a history as
worthless as a stone's throw, one might say.

306427.「その はなむけとして\n 余は 大収穫の決行を指示した。:
As tribute, I have ordered the execution of a
grand harvest.

306428.「念晶巨人が 創生のチカラを吸いあげる\n 荘厳な光景……しかと 目に焼きつける:
Witness the majesty of the Telecrystal Titan, absorbing the power of creation...remember it well. Let this be the prelude to Astoltia's
utter collapse.

306429.「ちっ！ 悠長に 作戦なんか\n 立ててる場合じゃ ないようだね。:
Tch! I guess now's not the best time for
coming up with some kind of plan.

306430.「全員 そろっているな？\n 今から フォーリオン外郭\n 神都の入り口 手前に:
You're all here, right? I want you all to
gather in the plaza in front of the entrance
to outer Fourion.

306431.「広場の床に 天使をモチーフにした\n モザイク画がある。その辺りで\n <pc:
There is an angel mosiac on the plaza's
floor. I'll have you use the divine artifact
around there, <pc>.

306432.戦う準備を ととのえて\nフォーリオン外郭 神都の門の\n入り口のあたりにある:
Make the necessary preparations for battle,
and then examine the mosiac near the Deity
Gate in Outer Fourion.

306433.「これから 神具 アストルティアの楯を使い\n <cs_pchero>に 創生巨:
We will now use the Shield of Astoltia to
transform <cs_pchero> into a
Colossus of Creation.

306434.「チカラの解放には 使用者のみならず\n この場につどった すべての英雄……\n:
For its power to be released, it is crucial for not only the user, but also for all the champions gathered hereーin other words, the
cooperation of the gods is essential.

306435.「ルティアナ様によると \n 創生巨神の動力源は 神々の命脈……\n つまり 命:
According to Lutiana, the source of power for
Colossi of Creation is the lifeblood of the
gods... Namely, life itself.

306436.「もう 覚悟はできている。\n 神授の間で 聞いたことは\n 皆に 話しておいた:
We're already prepared. I shared everything
I heard from the Hall of Divine Gifts with
everyone else.

306437.「……そうだったか。\n ぶっつけ本番になるが 頼む。:
Is that so... This is going to be a trial by
fire, but I'll be counting on you all.

306438.「<cs_pchero>。いつでも いいぜ。\n 神具のチカラを 使ってくれ。:
Whenever you're ready, <cs_pchero>!
Use the divine artifact's power!

306439.<cs_pchero>は 創生巨神に\n変化するよう 強く念じた。:
<cs_pchero> deeply thought about
transforming into a Colossus of Creation.

306440.「うっひょおおお！ すっげー！\n 身体が 光り出したぞ！\n このあと どうな:
Whooooa! How cool! My whole body's glowing!
What's gonna happen next?

306441.「兄者 うるさい！\n <cs_pchero>が 集中してんだから\n ジャマす:
Jeez, shut up! Don't interrupt me while I'm
focusing on <cs_pchero>... Wah!?

306442.「ダメだ！ 神都から はなれてくれ！\n 荷重に耐えられない！:
Stop it! Get away from the city! It can't
handle your weight!

306443.<cs_pchero>と融合した 英雄たちの声が\n頭の中から 聞こえてきた。:
<cs_pchero> heard the voices of the
merged champions inside their head.

306444.「<cs_pchero>の 見ている物が\n 俺にも見えるぞ！ みんなは どうだ:
I can see what <cs_pchero> sees!
How 'bout you guys?

306445.「ボクにも しっかり 見えてます。\n でも 身体を動かす自由は ないみたい。:
I can see quite clearly, too. But I don't
think I have any freedom to move my body.

306446.「おーい 聞こえるかぁ！\n 神剣レクタリスを 出してみろぉ！:
Hey! Can you hear me?
You should pull out Lectalis!

306447.「よっしゃあ！ そいつで 魔眼の月を\n 直接 ぶった切っておくれー！:
Oh yeah! Give that Eye of Evil a good slice
in two!

306448.「今の お前なら 造作もないはずだ。\n 魔眼の月は レンダーシアの上空に見える:
It should be a piece of cake now! It looks to
be visible directly above Lendersia. We're
all counting on you!

306449.「私にできることは\n もう ないのでしょうか……。: Is there nothing more I can do...?

306450.「今は 彼らを信じ 結果を待とう。\n お前が選んだ英雄を お前が信じないで\n:
Let's just trust them and wait to see what happens for now. What point is there to choosing a champion if you don't believe in
yourself? Things will go fine, you'll see.

306451.「くっそ……魔眼の月は まだ遠いな。:
Damn...that Eye of Evil is still pretty far
away...

306453.「あの光……まさか 創生のチカラ？:
That light...you don't think...the power of
creation!?

306454.「ちゅー ちゅー 吸い取ってやがる……。\n あのデカブツが ゲノスの言っていた:
He's sucking it all out... Is that the massive
Telecrystal Titan Genos was talking about...?

306456.「ここは 当初の目的どおり\n 魔眼の月の破壊に 向かうべきでは……。:
I think we should aim for destroying the
Eye of Evil as originally planned...

306457.「いや ほっとけねえな……。肩慣らしにも\n ちょうどいいし あのデクの坊を倒し:
We can't just leave him be... It's a good warm
up, anyways! Once we beat that colossal creep,
we'll slice that Eye to pieces!

306458.「<cs_pchero>さん！\n 今こそ 神剣で トドメを！:
<cs_pchero>!
Finish it off with the divine sword!

306459.「しぶてぇなあ！ どてっ腹に\n 一発 お見舞いしてやれッ！:
Don't know when to quit, do ya!? Let's give
him a good ol' punch right in the gut!

306460.「くっそ……あと ちょっとだってのに\n なんで 元に戻っちまうんだ……。:
Damn... We just needed a little more, but
now we're back to square one...

306461.「巨神化は 我ら 神の命脈を使って\n おこなわれるそうだからな……。\n これ:
The transformation into a Colossus
requires our divine lifeblood...
We must have reached its limit.

306463.「この調子じゃ 当分\n 巨神には なれそうにないぜ。\n 魔眼の月は どうすん:
I don't think you'll be able to become giant
again for a while. What should we do about
that Eye of Evil?

306464.「あの……魔眼の月を たたくのは\n もちろん 重要だけど……念晶巨人の部品が\:
Um....while it is important for us to attack
the Eye... I am concerned about the piece
of the Telecrystal Titan that flew off.

306465.「わたくしも ドルタムさまと 同意見です。\n あれは 不吉な物に感じます……。:
I agree with Doltam. It gives me a bad
feeling... Maybe we should worry about
the Eye later?

306466.「巨人の部品が 落下したのは\n 大エテーネ島の 方角だったね。\n とりあえず:
It looks like it flew towards Greater Ethene.
Let's move closer for a better look.

306467.「あんな巨大な物を 今の我々に\n 壊せるのでしょうか……。:
Can we really destroy something that large as
we are now...?

306468.「へへっ！ オレに まかせとけ！\n ……うぉおおおおおおッ！:
Hehe! Just leave that to me!
Huuuuuuuuurgh....!

306469.「うへー。\n さすがに ムリかぁ……。:
Phew...
Just as I thought, no good...

306471.「あああー！？ 兄者のバカー！\n 余計なこと するからーッ！！:
Waaahhh! You big idiot! This is why you
shouldn't do things like that!!

306473.「あの光は 創生のチカラ……\n 魔眼の月へ 送っているのか！？:
That light is the power of creation...
Is it being sent to the Eye of Evil?!

306474.「早く あれを壊さねば\n ジア・クトを 利することになる。\n 何か 手はない:
We need to destroy it quickly, lest it
benefits Dia Kut. Is there nothing we can
do...?

306475.「先ほど カブさまがやったように\n 自分たちの ありったけの チカラを\n 神:
Why not do what Kabu just did, and focus all
of our energy into the divine sword?

306476.「アストルティアの楯と同様 神剣レクタリスに \n 命脈をそそげば あれを 砕け:
Like the shield, if we give enough of our
lifeblood to the divine sword, we might gain
just enough power to destroy it.

306477.「審判の天使 ヘルヴェルも\n 同じようなことをして ジア・クトの船を\n 退け:
I heard that Helvel did the same exact thing
to get rid of Dia Kut's ship...

306478.「ためしてみる価値は ありそうだ。\n <cs_pchero>！ 神剣を出してく:
It's worth a shot! <cs_pchero>!
Take out the sword!

306480.「みなさんは ボクが守ります！\n その間に 神剣を！:
I'll protect all of you! Hurry and use the
divine sword!

306481.「無茶だ <cs_pchero>！\n ひとりで 相手にできる数じゃねえ！:
Don't be reckless! There's no way you can
take them all on yourself!

306482.「行くな！ キミまで抜けたら 神剣のチカラを\n 維持できない！ 奴らを 食い止:
Stay there! We need everyone to sustain the
sword's power. While they hold them back,
we'll do this together!

306484.「あなたの声が 聞こえた気がしたの。\n 心のままに動いて 正解だったわ。:
I thought it was your voice I heard...
I was right to follow my heart after all.

306485.「状況は よく わからないけれど\n あの敵を 食い止めれば いいのよね？:
I'm not sure exactly what's happening here,
but we have to stop them, right?

306486.「勇者と盟友が そろったからには\n 一歩も 先へ通さない！！:
Now that the Hero and ally are together,
we won't allow them another step!

306489.「私も 治療をしてほしいと 頼まれて\n 来たばかりなので 何が何やら……。:
I was also asked to come and help with
treatment, so I'm not quite sure...

306490.「炉のような物の そばで 倒れていたので\n これと 関係があるのかも しれませ:
She was found collapsed near that furnace
looking object, so it may have something
to do with that.

306492.「まさか 神化の炎に 飛び込んだのか！:
No way...you jumped into the Flame of
Deification!?

306493.「この 初期型の光炉が 作られた当時は\n 魂の燭台が 使われていなかった。神化:
During the time when this early-model furnace was created, Soul Candelabras weren't being used. The only way to undergo deification was
to burn the soul directly in the flame.

306494.「星巡りを乗り越えた 英雄ならばともかく\n ただの天使の身で そんなことをすれ:
It's possible for a champion who's endured
the Four Heavenly Trials...but as a mere
angel? Who knows what would happen...

306495.「ヤケドなどの 外傷はありません。\n なんだって こんな無茶を……。:
I see no burns or other injuries. What was the
reason for such recklessness...?

306496.「私にできることは\n もう ないのでしょうか……。: Is there nothing more I can do...?

306499.「いや ユーライザを運んでやろう。\n ここでは ろくな治療も できんだろうしな:
Never mind. We should take Yuliza back with
us. There's not much we can do for her here.

306500.「アシュレイを失い 創生巨神という\n 切り札を失ったが ほかに手はないか……\:
Now that we've lost Ashley, that means we've also lost our one advantage, the Colossus... What else can we do...? We have to think of
something before Dia Kut makes their move...

306501.「お前も それまで 英気を養っててくれ。\n こちらから 追って連絡する。:
Until then, you should keep your spirits high.
I'll be in contact with you some time later.

306503.「どうも こうも……\n すっかり ムシを決め込んでます。:
They've completely given up on everything,
it seems like...

306504.「ジア・ルーベといったか？\n 私は ミトラー。この天星郷の長だ。:
Dia Rubay, was it? I am Mitra, head of the
Firmament.

306505.「道連れ……砕けろ……？ ありえない。\n どの念晶体よりも ゲノス様の寵愛を\:
As collateral...shatter...? Impossible.
We were favored by the great Genos more than
any other. We were two special fragments...

306506.「特別ぅ？ 聞いて あきれるねえ。: Special? How surprising to hear you say that.

306507.「お前は 敵地で とらわれの身。\n 頼みの綱の ゲノス様は 救援ひとつ\n 寄:
You are a captive in enemy territory. This great Genos, your only hope...he hasn't made a single attempt to rescue you. You were
abandoned.

306508.「そんなはずない！！\n ルーベと サフィルは 特別なの！\n 王の愛と 王の叡:
That cannot be! Rubay and Saphir ARE special!
We are the ruler's beloved, the ruler's
wisdom!

306509.「でもさぁ 相方は 気づいていたようだぞ。\n 思い返してみな。お前たちの あの:
But you know what? I think your partner
noticed it. Think about it. That crown of
yours was just a tool to destroy your enemies.

306510.「いつまで 目を そらし続けるんだい？\n そんなだから 相方から\n バカ呼ば:
How long are you going to keep ignoring it?
This is exactly why your partner kept calling
you a fool!

306511.「黙れ！！ 引き裂いてやる！ そのクチを！:
SHUT UP!! I'll tear it off! That mouth of
yours!!

306513.「返せ！ 下等種族が 触れるな。\n サフィルの心が けがれる！:
Give it! You lowly species should not touch
it. Saphir's heart is broken!

306514.「はい そうですかって 返せるワケないだろ。\n 武器のたぐいかも しれないって:
As if I can respond with "Sure, go ahead."
It could be a weapon for all we know.

306515.「返して。もう 戦う意思はない。\n それは……サフィルの心だから\n 武器じゃ:
Give it back... We don't want to fight
anymore. Saphir's heart...it's no weapon.

306516.サフィルの心核を ジア・ルーベに渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Saphir's Core to Dia Rubay?<yesno><close>

306517.「返して。もう 戦う意思はない。\n それは……サフィルの心だから\n 武器じゃ:
Give it back... We don't want to fight
anymore. Saphir's heart...it's no weapon.

306518.サフィルの心核を ジア・ルーベに渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Saphir's Core to Dia Rubay?<yesno><close>

306519.<pc>は サフィルの心核を\nジア・ルーベに渡した。:
<pc> handed Saphir's Core over to
Dia Rubay.

306520.「念晶体の構造を 作り変える施術は\n 激痛を ともなったはずだ。:
The procedure to remodel your telecrystalline
structure must have been extremely painful.

306521.「研磨に耐え抜いた お前たちは\n 原石として より 輝きを増した。:
You two have endured the process of polishing.
As Primestones, you have become even more
brilliant.

306522.「クルヴィダの王冠を 授与する。\n たとえ 敵陣にあろうと 王冠を通じ\n 余:
I bestow upon you Kuruvida's Crown. Even if
you are behind enemy lines, you and I shall
be connected through it.

306523.「王冠の輝きが 頂点に達したとき\n 余の愛し子たる お前たちに 助勢を与える。:
When the crown's brilliance reaches its zenith, it shall grant assistance to you, my beloved children. It will become a
power that will vanquish your enemies.

306524.「王より たまわった冠は\n 能力を増強させる 道具であり\n 敗北したワタシた:
The crown given to use by our ruler is a tool
meant to enhance our abilities...and a tool
to destroy us upon our defeat.

306525.「我が王は せめて 敵を道連れに\n ここで砕けよと 言っているんだ。:
Our ruler...his words say that he wishes for
us to shatter, and at the very least, take
our enemies as collateral.

306526.「余の叡智。特別なかけらたる お前を\n ルミナのように ムダに死なせはせぬ。:
My wisdom. As a special fragment, I will not
allow your death to be in vain like that of
Dia Lumina's.

306527.「せめて 敵を巻き添えに……。\n これが ムダのない死か！:
At the very least, use it to take your enemies
down with you...
Is this not dying in vain!?

306528.「愛だの 叡智だの……ただの まやかし！\n ワタシたちは あまりに幼かった。\:
Love, and wisdom...we were deceived!
We were too young. We were taken advantage
of! We could not see it!

306529.「馬鹿ルーベ…… せめて お前だけでも。: Foolish Rubay... At the very least, you...

306531.「こりゃあ 手が付けられないね。\n いったん 退散するとしよう。:
This is going nowhere fast. We should leave
for now.

306532.「よかった！ 行き違いにならなくて！\n 聖天舎に うかがったのですが\n 出か:
Thank goodness I ran into you! I went to the
monastery, but they said you'd gone out...

306534.「とこしえの神殿の 楯の間を\n 片付けていたら 地下におりる しかけが\n 見:
We received a report that during cleaning of the Shield Room in the Temple of Eternity, a hidden passage leading underground was
discovered.

306535.「あそこは 長らく\n 結界で 閉ざされていたからな……。\n 未知の場所があっ:
That place has been closed off for a very
long time due to the ward... I'm not surprised
that there are some unknown parts of it.

306536.「すぐにでも 見にいきたいところだが\n ルーベの監視に 不安が残るな……。\n:
I'd like to go and take a look right now, but I'm worried about Rubay's surveillance. I'll go and make some quick arrangements for
some more people to watch her.

306537.「地下のほうは 先に ふたりで調べてくれ。\n 楯の間は 盟友の虚無を 抜けた先:
You two can go check out that underground area first. The shield room is just past the Ally's Void, isn't it? That brings back some bad
memories...

306538.「そろそろ いいんじゃないのか。\n 早くしないと あいつらも 持たねえぞ！:
We're running out of time... We're toast
if we don't do this soon!

306539.「やむを得まい！ 行くぞ！: We've no other choice! Come on!

306540.「いそげっ！ もう一度 振り下ろすぞ！: Hurry! We gotta give it one more swing!

306542.「でかしたぞ ふたりとも！\n あとは 俺にまかせて 休んでな！:
Nice work, you two! I'll take care of the
rest, so you just sit back and relax!

306544.「もう 限界なんだろ？\n 先輩の言うことは 聞いとけって。:
You've hit your limit, yeah?
You should really listen to your superiors.

306545.「……当代の勇者。会えて うれしかったぜ。\n お前は 盟友の手を はなすんじゃ:
I'm glad I got to meet you, present-day
Hero... Never let go of your ally's hand!

306546.「念晶巨人を失ったのは 痛手よなぁ……。:
Losing the Telecrystal Titan...quite the
setback...

306547.「まあ 創生のチカラは 十分 獲れた。\n これで 滅浄の大光を撃てよう。:
Well, enough power of creation has been
gathered. Now we can fire the Purging
Pulse.

306548.「滅浄の刻をもって この文明は滅ぶ。\n 残された日々……大切に過ごせよ ククク:
With that moment of cleansing, this
civilization shall perish. Cherish dearly
your final days... Keh heh heh!

306551.<cs_pchero>は 彼らが 天星郷で復活した\nアストルティアの 英雄たち:
<cs_pchero> confided to Anlucia that
they were the champions of Astoltia
resurrected in the Firmament.

306552.「当代の勇者 アンルシアです。\n 歴史に名を刻んだ 英雄の皆さま方に\n お会:
I am the present-day Hero, Anlucia. It's a
great honor to meet the champions who
have etched their names in history.

306553.「先ほどは 助けていただき\n ありがとうございました。勇者アシュレイ。:
Thank you for your help from before,
Ashley.

306554.「勇者が 助けにきてくれたんだ。\n 小柄な……かわいらしい子だったよ。:
The Hero came to my rescue. She was...
a cute little girl.

306556.「天星郷に 戻りましょう！\n いそがないと 手遅れになります。:
We have to return to the Firmament! It will
be too late if we don't hurry!

306557.「ああ そうだな。いそごう。: Yes, you're right. Let us hurry.

306558.「羽根飾り……まだ 持っててくれたんだな。\n 今度は もっと いいのを 作って:
I'm...glad you still have that feather
adornment. I'll make a better one for you
this time...

306559.「<cs_pchero>。私も ジア・クトと戦うわ！\n いっしょに行かせて。\:
I'll fight against Dia Kut as well! Please let
me come with you. As the Hero, I can't just
sit idly by and do nothing.

306560.「気持ちは うれしいが……英雄ならぬ身で\n 天星郷には 立ち入れぬ。今すぐ\n:
We appreciate the sentiment, but...you are no champion, so you cannot enter the Firmament. Joining our battle right now would be
difficult.

306561.「また 地上をねらった ジア・クトの侵攻が\n あるかもしれません。勇者さまは:
There may be another invasion by Dia Kut that
targets the surface. Please protect the people
of Astoltia who are alive today.

306562.「……わかりました。当代の勇者として\n 地上を守る つとめを果たすことで\n:
I understand... I will uphold my duty as Hero
and protect the surface while supporting you
in your battles to come.

306563.「でも 助けが必要な時は いつでも呼んで。\n いいわね？ <cs_pchero:
But if you ever need my help, you can call for
me anytime. Okay, <cs_pchero>?

306564.「それでは 失礼します。英雄の皆さま方。\n いつの日か 再会できることを 願っ:
I take my leave, then. To all you champions,
I hope we can meet again someday...

306565.「たとえ 神になろうとも\n 命脈を使い果たせば 跡形もなく消える……。\n こ:
Even as gods, if we exhaust all of our life
energy...we disappear without a trace.
Is this our fate...?

306567.「フフ 同感です。でも こんなにも早く\n 別れが おとずれるなんて……。:
Hmm hmm...I share that sentiment. But to think
that our parting would come so soon...

306568.「たとえ ひとたび 生を終えた身であっても\n こればかりは……つらいものだな。:
Even if one's life already ended once
before... This parting...it's painful.

306569.「今夜は 弔い酒だ！ 派手に送ってやろうぜ！\n しみったれたのを 一番 きらう:
Tonight, we drink to say goodbye! Let's send
'em off with a bang! He's the one who hated
being a downer more than anyone!

306570.<cs_pchero>たちは 天星郷に戻った……。:
<cs_pchero> and co. returned to the
Firmament...

312343.ジア・クルヴィダを 倒したときに手に入れた\nサフィルの心核が 突然 ふるえだし:
Saphir's Core from the defeated Dia Kuruvida
suddenly began shaking.

312344.ジア・ルーベの言葉に 同意するように\nサフィルの心核が 大きく 鼓動を打った。:
Saphir's Core beats loudly in agreement with
Dia Rubay's words. It doesn't seem
particularly dangerous.

312345.ジア・ルーベの言葉に 同意するように\nサフィルの心核が 大きく 鼓動を打った。:
Saphir's Core beats loudly in agreement with
Dia Rubay's words. It doesn't seem
particularly dangerous.

312346.「知りたいの。サフィルの心が。: We must know...what's inside Saphir's heart...

312347.<pc>たちは 回生堂に入り\n２階にある ジア・ルーベが\n軟禁されている部屋:
<pc> and co. entered the rest spot,
heading upstairs to the room where
Dia Rubay was being detained.

312348.「急がねえと……修行に 遅れちまう。\n 師匠は 気が 短けえ から……。:
If you don't hurry...you're gonna be late for
training. The Master has a short temper...
ya know...

314670.<center>アストルティアの子よ。\nそして 各種族から生まれた神々よ。:
O child of Astoltia...and the gods born from
each of the races.

314671.<center>アストルティアの楯の チカラの解放を\n望むなら 神具の所有者は:
If you wish to release the Shield of Astoltia's power, then the one who holds the artifact shall stand in the center seal, with
the six gods surrounding them.

314672.<center>神具の所有者が\n神々の信頼を得た 人物であると認める。:
The one who holds the divine artifacts is
recognized as one who has earned the
trust of the gods.

314673.<center>秘密殿に至る扉を 解放しよう。\n汝 神具解放の試練を 乗り越え:
I shall open the door to the secret chamber. You must overcome the trials of unlocking the divine artifacts, and come to the deepest
chamber, where my divine gift awaits.
